title: Contact
content:
Welcome to a markdown rendered page from NetlifyCMS!

We can do formatting like **Bold** and *Italics*, we can make lists:

* With bullet points

1. Or numbers

and much more. 

Just note, because tailwind.css overwrites all the default element styles, you'll need to add css to render these properly, check the css/tailwind.css file for more.

 The data files are stored as JSON so that we get type inference for free with typescript.

contact.title: Contact Us by
contact.description: Put the potentially record low maximum sea ice extent tihs year down to low ice. According to the National Oceanic and Atmospheric Administration, Ted, Scambos.

items.title: Phone
items.description: Some quick example text to build on the card title and make up the bulk of the card's content.
